useCase.name: View and Add Account Note
useCase.description: User views and adds a note to the account.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has access to the account.

successEndConditions.condition: Note successfully added to the account.

failureEndConditions.condition: Error occurred while adding the note.

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the 'Add account note' button.

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the 'Add account note' button.
User navigates to the 'Add note' page.
User inputs data for the note.
User clicks on the 'Save Note' button.
System returns the created note data.
User navigates back to the account view.
